div.h4: The premiere went well. Ella from the theater says that some of the students were unsatisfied. They had bad vision and were not able to see everything on stage well. You create a brainstorm with Ella and Jacob to come up with good ideas for solving the problem.
div.h6: Write in the space below. Click "Enter" everytime you have written an idea. While you are writing, you can see Ella and Jacob's ideas on the screen. Click the text in the big square when you are ready to brainstorm. Go to the next task when you are out of ideas. You will automatically go on to the next task after 3 minutes.
